Ann_Arbor.Ann Arbor Municipal Airport:
Ann Arbor Municipal Airport (IATA: ARB, ICAO: KARB, FAA LID: ARB) is a general aviation airport in Washtenaw County, Michigan, United States. It is included in the Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) National Plan of Integrated Airport Systems for 2017 to 2021, in which it is categorized as a regional general aviation facility.
The airport is located in Pittsfield Township, but the airport is owned and operated by the City of Ann Arbor, The airport property is currently located entirely within Pittsfield township having been annexed by the City of Ann Arbor for water rights before Pittsfield became a charter township in 1972.
